title: SnapDock — Markdown Workspace
description: A clean, fast Markdown reader built with pure JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. SnapDock provides a distraction‑free workspace with file-tree navigation, multi-file viewing, and a polished ZetoLabs interface.

features.title: File-Tree Navigation
features.description: Browse folders of Markdown files with a simple, responsive sidebar.

features.title: Multi-File Viewing
features.description: Open multiple documents and switch between them instantly.

features.title: Drag-and-Drop Support
features.description: Drop files or folders directly into SnapDock to load them immediately.

features.title: PDF Export (Planned)
features.description: Future support for exporting Markdown documents to clean, styled PDFs.

engineeringNotes: SnapDock is intentionally lightweight and dependency‑free, built with native web technologies for maximum clarity and maintainability. The UI follows ZetoLabs design principles: clean, minimal, and distraction‑free. Cross‑platform builds are planned once the underlying OS tooling is ready.

title: ZIA — Modular AI Assistant Framework
description: A proof-of-concept modular AI assistant that connects Slack, Discord, and a web interface to local or external AI models. Built to explore persona switching, persistent memory, and multi‑platform routing.

features.title: Slack & Discord Handlers
features.description: Unified message routing across multiple chat platforms.

features.title: Persona Templates
features.description: Switch between conversation styles using JSON-based persona configs.

features.title: Persistent Memory
features.description: Per-channel JSON memory storage with no database required.

features.title: Config-Driven Setup
features.description: All behavior controlled through JSON files — no code edits needed.

engineeringNotes: ZIA is intentionally raw — a prototype that laid the groundwork for ZetoAI. It demonstrates routing, persona switching, and memory, but is not intended as a polished product.

title: NestKey — Secure Password Vault
description: A lightweight, offline password vault built with pure JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. NestKey focuses on local-first security with no cloud storage, no telemetry, and full user control.

features.title: Local-Only Storage
features.description: All credentials are stored offline on your device. No cloud sync, no external servers.

features.title: AES-256 Encryption
features.description: All vault data is encrypted using industry-standard AES-256.

features.title: Master Password Lock
features.description: Secure your vault with a single master password.

features.title: Auto-Fill (Planned)
features.description: Future browser extension for seamless login workflows.

engineeringNotes: NestKey is intentionally simple and transparent, built with native web technologies for maximum auditability. Encryption is handled client-side, ensuring that sensitive data never leaves the user's machine. Cross-platform packaging will be added once OS tooling is ready.

title: Thronebound — Kingdom‑Building Survival RTS (Concept)
description: A first-person kingdom‑building survival RTS concept built around a single core rule: protect the throne at all costs. Thronebound blends voxel mining, villager automation, RTS combat, and age progression into a unified kingdom simulation.

features.title: Throne‑Centric Gameplay
features.description: Your throne is your respawn, progression hub, and loss condition. Lose it, lose the kingdom.

features.title: First‑Person Kingdom Building
features.description: Gather resources, place buildings, and command villagers directly from ground level.

features.title: Villager Workforce System
features.description: Hire workers, builders, soldiers, and specialists to automate your economy and defend your realm.

features.title: Age Progression
features.description: Advance through multiple ages, unlocking new tech, units, and structures.

features.title: RTS Combat & Defense
features.description: Build armies, fortify walls, and defend your throne from raids, factions, and rival kingdoms.

engineeringNotes: Thronebound is being designed from the ground up in Rust using the Bevy engine to ensure scalable AI, efficient ECS-driven simulation, and lightweight performance for large villager populations and RTS-scale battles. The project is currently in the concept and architecture phase, with voxel terrain, AI behavior trees, and throne progression systems planned.

title: Networking & Systems — ZetoLabs Infrastructure
description: The internal infrastructure powering ZetoLabs: secure networking, home‑lab servers, API tooling, and a disciplined deployment workflow designed for reliability, transparency, and future scalability.

features.title: Secure Home‑Lab Architecture
features.description: Ubuntu 24.04 LTS servers running behind managed switches, custom firewall rules, and isolated virtual networks.

features.title: API & Internal Tooling (ZIA)
features.description: Local-first API services powering automation, client workflows, and internal dashboards.

features.title: Controlled Deployment Pipeline
features.description: Git → Syncthing → Server workflow ensuring only reviewed, approved files reach production.

features.title: Monitoring & Uptime
features.description: Uptime Kuma dashboards, Nginx health checks, and network isolation for reliability.

features.title: Future Production Model
features.description: Dedicated Git control machines + redundant hosting servers for scalable client deployments.

engineeringNotes: ZetoLabs infrastructure is built with a security‑first mindset: isolated networks, hardened SSH, strict firewall rules, and a controlled deployment pipeline. All systems are documented as credibility artifacts, ensuring repeatability and professional optics as the company scales.
